text.title: Alabama Supreme Court orders judges to stop issuing same-sex marriage licences
text.head: Alabama Supreme Court orders judges to stop issuing same-sex marriage licences
Sources

list.item: Fred Barbash. "In defiant ruling, Alabama Supreme Court stops same-sex marriage in state" — The Washington Post , March 4, 2015
"Alabama Supreme Court orders halt to same-sex marriage licences" — BBC News Online , March 4, 2015
Kyle Whitmire, Brendad Kirby, Kent Faulk. "Alabama Supreme Court orders halt to same-sex marriages" — The Birmingham News , March 4, 2015
